LandingPage.title: HOME
LandingPage.worldDesc: Mother Earth needs your help. With the fallout from climate change and mass extinctions looming, she is slipping away right under our noses. Art for Environment – NFT (AFE-NFT) aims to slow her decay by becoming a vehicle for aiding her recovery.
LandingPage.nftDesc: AFE-NFT is online collection of high-quality artworks that poignantly address current and pressing environmental issues. These artworks by renowned artists Minted and stored as ERC-721 tokens, Each artworks contains 3 Token of the same artwork, priced at USD 2,700 per piece. 20% of all our proceeds will be donated to several environmental charities, including the World Wildlife Fund (WWF) and Climate Action Network (CAN). The remaining balance will be equally divided between the artist and the project. SMART CONTRACT ADDRESS: 0x0e5c6b92196a5C7C0CB913e955335a407F3b50fA
